app.description: Study Cycle helps learners organize study time, track progress, and follow adaptive courses to reach their goals.

hero.title: Learn at Your Own Pace
hero.description: Study Cycle is a modern learning platform that adapts to your unique learning style and goals.

courses.title: Interactive Courses
courses.description: Learn with our adaptive courses that adjust to your skill level

skills.title: Track Your Skills
skills.description: Monitor your progress with our detailed skill tracking system

community.title: Join the Community
community.description: Connect with other learners and share your knowledge

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.content1: Study Cycle has transformed the way I learn. The adaptive courses and skill tracking keep me motivated.
testimonials.content2: As a teacher, I love how Study Cycle makes it easy to create and share custom learning paths.
testimonials.content3: I can easily track my child's progress and see where they need help. Great platform!
